text: The National Association of Evangelicals (NAE) is a fellowship of member denominations, churches, organizations, and individuals. Its stated goal is to honor God by connecting and representing evangelicals in the United States. Today it works in four main areas: Church & Faith Partners, Government Relations, Chaplains Commission, and World Relief. The NAE is a member of the World Evangelical Alliance (WEA). ==Other websites== * *Generation Forum Category:1942 establishments in the United States Category:Evangelicalism Category:Christian organizations based in the United States Category:Religious organizations established in the 20th century
title: National Association of Evangelicals
